name: Fire
baseMeaning: A flame or fire, representing combustion or heat.
tldr: Means something is hot, exciting, impressive, or trending. Major compliment in modern slang.

contextMeanings.meaning: Something is extremely good, impressive, or attractive.
Someone is attractive or their content is appealing.
A project or performance is exceptionally good.

platformNotes.note: Used to indicate viral or trending content, or to compliment creators.
Common compliment on photos and stories, especially for fashion or fitness.
Often used to highlight hot takes or trending topics.

generationalNotes.note: Universal term of approval meaning something is excellent.
Same usage as Gen Z - widely understood as a compliment.
May interpret more literally as fire or heat-related.
